name: Grapple Grub
description:
Welcome to Grapple Grub!

Because there is no tutorial right now I'll put the controls here.

WASD - move

Space - jump

Left Click - grapple

TAB - Bring up delivery UI

Q - Pulse Gun

E - interact with food carts

Shift - Slide (but it is pretty rough right now)

If you click on a delivery, either at the shop or in the Delivery UI it will show you where to drop it off on the minimap.

Disclaimer: This game is far from complete! There will be bugs, and a lot of them! Most of them will be ironed out with time if this team can find the will to push forward through this hell.

Please Fill out our playtesting survey after you finish playing!

Link:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSffafEK9yEH4XttySEjX1Qlx7RwKdzK-3E3mvyj...

Have fun!
